name: 120 sqM - 3 bedrooms + lounge in central Zurich
description:
The condominium is 10 minutes from Central Zurich,
The building is new, completed in June 2017. This apartment is on the 3rd floor, overlooking the Crowne Plaza Hotel.
Trams and buses are 2 minutes walk away (Albisriederplatz).
There are 3 bedrooms:
It possible for a maximum of 10 people to sleep there.
Suitable for parents, children, and grandparents. There is no TV and no sofa in the lounge.
There are mattresses on the floor in every bedroom.
neighborhood_overview:
Zurich Albisriederplatz is 1 minute walk
Trams and buses 10 mins to Central Zurich
Letzipark shopping centre, and Letzigrund are within walking distance.
host_about:
I was born in India, lived for many years in London and Tokyo.., 
and lived in Zurich for a few years.

name: Style&Large @Hip-Party-Area with HomeCinema.
neighborhood_overview: This is a very lively area in the middle of restaurants, bars and  nightlife. The media call it the Hipster-Area of Zürich. Its a paradise for people who loves culture: There are 100 Restaurants, Bars, Cafes, etc. of all kinds in walking distance from the apartement. You can get Food from Swiss. India. Thai. Türkey Greek, Spain, German, and so on. The famous vegetarian Restaurant „Hiltl“ is just around the corner. As well you will find Clubs where you can go for dancing and enjoy life. This is „Kreis4“ of Zürich. The foodstore „Coop“ is in 25 meter distance and is open till 22.00h from Monday till Saturday. Please be aware, that it can be noisy at night sometimes on friday or saturday night, when the weather is warm and people are on the way.

name: Your Urban Sanctuary, 80sqm, 10min to city centre
description:
Only 5 minutes walk from Zurich-Altstetten train station. From here in 5 min you will be in the city centre (main station or by the lake) and at the airport in 20 minutes.
The "Farbhof" tram station is practically on the doorstep (2 min) and offers direct connections to all the sights in Zurich!
Important: there are two cats living in the apartment. Please only book if you like cats.
Free visitor parking behind the house.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is part of a housing complex with a playing field for kids and some green fields. It is a calm area and in summer you can enjoy the sun, relaxing on my  big sofa on my terrace or simply have a relaxed breakfast/ dinner there. Table, chairs and an electric grill are available outside.
host_about:

I work in sales and I love to dance Salsa. For both I travel a lot, within Europe and also worldwide. 
I grew up in Germany, and after a few years in Vienna and Italy I finally ended up here in Zurich. 
For conversations I can offer you german, english, italian, french and spanish.

name: Stauffacher Apartment- Kuhn
description: The Zürich Stauffacher Kuhn– Apartment is a beautiful and newly furnished 3-room apartment (54m2) in Zurich. It offers two bedrooms with a queen size bed each and a living room with an extra sofa bed for one.
neighborhood_overview: The charming and modern business apartment boasts an excellent location in Zurich. The apartment is located next to the “Bäckeranlage” park and is still close to the heart of Zurich. The famous shopping areas like the Bahnhofstrasse or the old town "Niederdorf" with its many shops and restaurants are only a few minutes away by tram. The apartment is directly accessible by public transport. The nearest tram station "Helevetiaplatz" is only 150m away – from which you have direct connections to the lake and the famous “Bahnhofstrasse”. The main station in Zurich can be reached in about 12 minutes by tram or bus. There are Supermarkets in the direct vicinity. The “Denner” and “Coop” supermarkets are only 100m away.

name: Central Loft w. sauna, garden and private parking
description:
Beautiful, open plan luxury apartment, in a newly reconstructed building that once acted as a showroom, warehouse and repair site for the legendary Citroen model DS - the goddess La Déesse.

The apartment is fully fitted and has everything you need to have a relaxed stay in Zurich.

It is easy to reach by public transport, with two tram and bus stops only a 5 minute walk away. For those coming by car, a dedicated parking spot is available in the garage.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Zurich's third district ("Kreis 3, Alt-Wiedikon).

Kreis 3 lies to the south west of the city centre and is bordered by the river Sihl and parts of the Albis mountain range. It comprises Sihlfeld, Alt-Wiedikon and Friesenberg and is overlooked by Bühlkirche and behind this, Zurich’s “very own mountain” Uetliberg. Wiedikon became part of the city of Zürich in 1893 and it is now home to around 47,000 people.

Today, the district is mostly residential. If you wander through the streets of Kreis 3 (which I highly recommend) you’ll find numerous green spaces filled with picnicking families and school children, as well as a large number of antique stores, with some vintage clothing shops thrown in as well.

Wiedikon is home to a number of authentic and very satisfying Asian restaurants. You can find Vietnamese, Thai, Chinese, Indian and Japanese food. Mexican and Spanish cuisine is also available, as well as perennial Swiss, Italian
host_about: Hi, my name is Harm. I am a father of three wonderful kids, love to travel, love technology, love architecture, love art and design,  love fine food and wine, love skiing, hiking and other outdoor activities, love meeting interesting people across the globe.

description: We offer a very nice, sunny and comfortable apartment, inside a 3 family house recently renovated. It's on a very quiet location in a blind street near the woods. The bus stop that leads from and to the main station (Zurich HB) is 250m away but if you prefer driving we have a parking and a EV Charger. ALDI, Denner & Migros supermarkets are 280m away in a shopping mall and if you like jogging or nature, the forest it's at the end of the street.
neighborhood_overview:
We are in Witikon one of the most exclusive neighbourhoods in Zurich at the east side of the Lake, better known as the Golden Coast, because the sun reaches all year long. Close we have the Zurich Zoo and the Dolder Bath & Ice Skating. The woods are just at the end of the street and three supermarkets (ALDI, Migros and Denner) are on a shopping mall 280 meters away from the house.

The east side of the lake offers several distractions if you like art and culture, close is The Kunsthaus (Art Museum), The Bellerive Museum, The Tram Museum, The Corbusier House, The China Garden, the Opera House and of course many spots at the lake where you can take a swim or go for a picnic in summer.
host_about: We are Juerg and Valeria, avid globetrotters and your hosts. With a wealth of travel experience, we understand what fellow travellers desire in rentals. Our apartments, infused with meticulous attention to detail, promise excellence in every aspect - from handpicked furnishings to spotless cleanliness. We're not just hosts; we're your guides and friends, dedicated to your comfort and satisfaction. Join us for an unforgettable stay.

Situated in a charming & safe neighbourhood, with restaurants, bars, bakery, shops all within proximity.

A rare gem in the city center!
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is just round the corner from Stauffacher, and close to Zurich’s vibrant central district. Surrounded by restaurants, shops and services, this neighbourhood is safe and has plenty to offer.

With many popular restaurants just right next door (Ichizen Japanese, Mythos Greek, Molino Italian, Le Cedre Lebanese, St. Jakob Bakery & Café etc.) and a mini supermarket just one minute walk away, you are well served in the area.

For those who like to keep active, NON STOP GYM is right across the road and Hallenbad City Indoor Swimming Pool is within five minutes of the apartment, while nearby Kasernenareal Park is perfect for a lunchtime stroll.

And if you’re keen to soak up some culture, the Kantonspolizei Zürich Kriminalmuseum and Haus Konstruktiv modern art museum are all a short walk away.
host_about:
Hello! My name is Cher.
 
 I enjoy traveling around the world, exploring new destinations, staying at luxury properties and  learning about other cultures. 

My philosophy is "Be a traveler, not a tourist!"
 
You are most welcome to come and stay in my unique apartments in Zurich, which have been prepared with you, the traveller in mind! The apartment will be your home away from home. 
 
 I consider each one of you as my guests and not customers. I will be very happy to give you recommendations during your stay, and I have prepared a bespoke Manual which upon check-in will give you useful information about the location, public transport and recommendations to restaurants and cafes in the neighbourhood, with clear directions how to get there from the apartment.

name: Vast Modern Apt: Near ZH Main Station
description: Experience the charm of Zurich in this spacious, well-furnished maisonette apartment, perfect for 1-5 guests. With a supermarket in the building and the convenient tram stop 'Hottingerplatz' right outside, you'll be just minutes away from the renowned 'Kunsthaus' art museum. Located in a prestigious area surrounded by picturesque townhouses, it's an ideal setting for delightful walks.
neighborhood_overview:
Nestled in a prosperous neighbourhood, this apartment is surrounded by a rich tapestry of local cultures and traditions. Immerse yourself in the charm of the small ancient "village center," where you'll find all your daily necessities within easy reach. A leisurely stroll of approximately 1 kilometer will lead you to the vibrant Niederdorf, Zurich's old town, brimming with history and charm.

Explore the artistic side of Zurich with renowned museums such as the museum of art and Kulturama, both within walking distance. The vibrant theater scene and the picturesque Lake Zurich are also just a pleasant walk away, offering an array of recreational activities.

For an enchanting coffee experience, don't miss the hidden gem, Kafi Paradiesli, located at Hofstrasse 19, 8032 Zurich. This delightful café offers a cozy atmosphere, delectable treats, and a thoughtfully curated menu, ensuring a memorable visit.
host_about:
We turn temporarily vacant properties into contemporary furnished short-term rental apartments. 

Our apartments shall be functional and clean at a fair rate and our team can be reached 24/7 in order to assist you with anything you might need. 

Stay in our apartments without being guilty of contributing to gentrification. Our apartments are not being rented from the regular market to be let as furnished apartments. Properties we use are temporary empty and instead of staying empty are being furnished & rented to you for a limited amount of time.

I strongly recommend to have a walk to Kafi Paradiesli, Hofstrasse 19, 8032 Zürich, a very nice sweet little hidden coffee place with a small but good menu.

name: Zürich 2,5 Zimmer-Zuhause mit Aussicht 65 qm
description:
Absolute top location in Zurich. The Top is an extremely sunny beautiful large quiet 2.5 room apartment of 65m2 on the 1st floor with elevator. The 2 large bedrooms (all with new guest mattresses) comfortably accommodate 8 travelers. All rooms with new mineral natural floor and floor heating. Large balcony/big terrace and large garden all around the house

- WM and Tumbler for an additional fee

Entire 2.5 room apartment can also be rented for CHF 2880. NK/month to be rented.
neighborhood_overview:
District 7 in Zurich
Kreis 7 is considered Zurich's top residential area. It is popular because of the tranquility, the sunshine and the beautiful old buildings. Anyone who lives on the Zurich or Adlisberg has high standards. The buildings are maintained or old buildings are replaced by new buildings.
The forest and various parks offer plenty of space for sporting activities or for relaxing hours.
For children there is a large Robinson playground in close proximity. Beach/bathing establishments and outdoor pools are easily accessible by public transport.
In the nearest area you can shop comfortably in Migros, Coop or Denner or enjoy a breakfast in the Honold - Confiserie and bakery.

name: Spectacular lake view in quiet street Apartment
description: We offer a very nice, sunny and comfortable apartment in Zurich, inside a 3 family house recently renovated. It's on a very quiet location in a blind street near the woods. The bus stop that leads from and to the main station (Zurich HB) is 250m away but if you prefer driving we have a parking and a EV charger. ALDI, Denner & Migros supermarkets are 280m away in a shopping mall and if you like jogging or nature, the forest it's at the end of the street.
neighborhood_overview:
We are in Witikon one of the most exclusive neighbourhoods in Zurich at the east side of the Lake, better known as the Golden Coast, because the sun reaches all year long. Close we have the Zurich Zoo and the Dolder Bath & Ice Skating. The woods are just at the end of the street and three supermarkets (ALDI, Migros and Denner) are on a shopping mall 280 meters away from the house.

The east side of the lake offers several distractions if you like art and culture, close is The Kunsthaus (Art Museum), The Bellerive Museum, The Tram Museum, The Corbusier House, The China Garden, the Opera House and of course many spots at the lake where you can take a swim or go for a picnic in summer.
host_about: We are Juerg and Valeria, avid globetrotters and your hosts. With a wealth of travel experience, we understand what fellow travellers desire in rentals. Our apartments, infused with meticulous attention to detail, promise excellence in every aspect - from handpicked furnishings to spotless cleanliness. We're not just hosts; we're your guides and friends, dedicated to your comfort and satisfaction. Join us for an unforgettable stay.

You are most welcome to come and stay in my unique apartments in Zurich, which have been prepared with you, the traveller in mind! The apartment will be your home away from home.

I will be very happy to give you recommendations during your stay, and I have prepared a bespoke Manual which upon check-in will give you useful information about the location, public transport and recommendations to restaurants and cafes in the neighbourhood, with clear directions how to get there from the apartment.

neighborhood_overview:
Nestled in Zurich's dynamic Oerlikon district, this neighborhood is a vibrant blend of modern charm and historical allure, perfect for guests seeking an authentic Swiss experience. Just minutes from Zurich Airport, Oerlikon offers unmatched accessibility for exploring the city's rich tapestry of culture and convenience.

Vibrant Urban Living:
Oerlikon is celebrated for its diverse cultural scene, from the iconic Hallenstadion hosting concerts and events to the bustling Market Oerlikon, where fresh, local produce awaits. The district's modern architecture and public parks, like the innovative MFO-Park, provide a green escape amidst urban vitality.

Culinary Delights & Shopping:
A haven for foodies, Oerlikon's streets are lined with an array of dining options and shopping venues. Whether you're craving cozy café vibes or fresh market finds, this neighborhood caters to all tastes.

Seamless Connectivity:
With superb public transport links, incl

Our real estate company is a leading provider of serviced apartments solutions, dedicated to delivering exceptional services to our clients. With a focus on providing high-quality, fully-furnished apartments that offer all the comforts of home, we have become a trusted name in the industry.

We specialize in providing serviced apartments that are ideal for both short-term and long-term stays, and we offer a range of options to meet the unique needs of each client. From luxury apartments in prime locations to more affordable options, we have something to suit every budget and preference.

Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to providing exceptional service and ensuring that our clients have a seamless and enjoyable experience. We understand that our clients have busy lives, and we are committed to making their stay with us as comfortable and convenient as possible.

Whether you are a corporate traveler, a family on vacation, or anyone in between, we are here to provide you with the perfect serviced apartment solution. With a focus on quality and service, we are dedicated to ensuring that our clients have the best possible experience, every time.

description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this sophisticated District 2, Wollishofen furnished three bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and stylish living room with great balcony views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Zurich has to offer! (ID #ZRH25)
neighborhood_overview: Set on the left bank of Lake Zurich, Wollishofen is a beautiful neighborhood that is prized for its twin waterside parks, Landiwiese and Saffa-Insel. This Central Zurich area is also known for great cuisine, including Irish pubs, casual spots catering to students and a variety of international restaurants and small shops. Other neighborhood highlights include the Rote Fabrik, a former factory that has been repurposed as a performing arts center, and the quirky Ortsmuseum Wollishofen. The incredible Reitberg Museum is just a short walk away from Wollishofen. The neighborhood is served by several bus, tram and S-Bahn lines, making it easy to get around.

 I enjoy traveling around the world, exploring new destinations, staying at luxury properties and  learning about other cultures.

name: Wohnung in Zürich mit Dachterrasse // Langstrasse
description:
Beautiful old apartment directly on the Langstrasse (party mile of Zurich).
The apartment has 3 bedrooms (2x double beds, 1x single bed), a living room with workplace and pull-out sofa, a shower, a toilet and a beautiful roof terrace.
The apartment is on the 3rd floor, without elevator.
neighborhood_overview:
Langstrasse is Zurich's most colorful and diverse neighborhood. During the day, you can enjoy international specialties and multicultural shopping here, while the street turns into Zurich's starting mile at night.

One bar is lined up next to the other, hip clubs are home to this place, and if you're hungry for food in a lot of takeaways and 24-hour shops.

The Langstrasse never sleeps and is interested in one of the most popular neighborhoods in the city from the former red light environment. This is also thanks to many young designers and restaurateurs who have upgraded the neighborhood in recent years.
(zuerich.com text)
host_about:
Unique location, directly on Limmatquai in the heart of Zurich's old town. Only 7 minutes by foot to the train station, a tram stop is just outside the building (»Rudolf-Brun-Brücke»). 
The rooms are newly renovated, they all have a sink in the room, toilets and showers are shared.
It's an almost 500-year-old building with a lot of charm. 
***
Einmalige Lage, direkt am Limmatquai im Herzen von Zürich. Nur 7 Gehminuten vom Hauptbahnhof entfernt, Tramhaltestelle »Rudolf-Brun-Brücke» direkt vor dem Haus.
Frisch renovierte und neu eingerichtete Zimmer, alle mit Lavabo im Zimmer, Duschen/Toiletten auf dem Gang. 
Schöner Aufenthaltsraum mit Blick auf die Limmat. Ein 500-jähriges Haus mit viel Charme!

description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Zurich has to offer! (ID #ZRH35)
neighborhood_overview: Just southeast of central Zurich is Weinegg, a sprawling, semi-rural district set on a wooden hillside far above the city. This peaceful area is an easy introduction to the city, with plenty of conveniences. There are also notable cultural attractions, including Zurich's Tram Museum, where you can see decommissioned cars from the 19th and 20th centuries, and the University of Zurich Botanical Gardens, where you can explore the world of plants. Wine lovers will want to save time on the weekends to explore the various vineyards set in the hills of Weinegg. The neighborhood is served by several bus, tram and S-Bahn lines, making it easy to get around.

description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this cozy District 3, Wiedikon furnished three bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and lovely living room with great balcony views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Zurich has to offer! (ID #ZRH57)
neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon is Zurich's third district, and has a residential character. This quiet neighborhood is set on the lower slopes of Uetliberg, which makes for some incredible views. There are also hiking trails nearby, including the Planet Trail, an easy two hour hike from Uetliberg to Felsenegg. Wiedikon is home to a variety of restaurants, encompassing everything from fast casual dining to traditional Swiss fare. The Sihlcity shopping mall is the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy, and the surrounding area is home to cocktail lounges and pubs, as well as several notable international restaurants. There are train stations and tram stops throughout Wiedikon, making it easy to get into the heart of the city quickly.

description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this stylish District 3, Wiedikon furnished three bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and beautiful living room with great balcony views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Zurich has to offer! (ID #ZRH45)
neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon is Zurich's third district, and has a residential character. This quiet neighborhood is set on the lower slopes of Uetliberg, which makes for some incredible views. There are also hiking trails nearby, including the Planet Trail, an easy two hour hike from Uetliberg to Felsenegg. Wiedikon is home to a variety of restaurants, encompassing everything from fast casual dining to traditional Swiss fare. The Sihlcity shopping mall is the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy, and the surrounding area is home to cocktail lounges and pubs, as well as several notable international restaurants. There are train stations and tram stops throughout Wiedikon, making it easy to get into the heart of the city quickly.

neighborhood_overview: Langstrasse is known for its young and night scene. Here, you will never get bored at the weekends. Bars and nightclubs are all around the street and perfect for having fun with locals and foreigners all night long. Additionally, there are various places to shop and eat, such as luxury streetwear boutiques, international eateries, and burger spots. Summer concerts are staged at the pavilion in the Bäckeranlage, and travelling shows and circus activities are housed in the barracks area.

Situated in a charming & safe neighbourhood, with restaurants, bars, bakery, shops all within proximity.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is just round the corner from Stauffacher, and close to Zurich’s vibrant central district. Surrounded by restaurants, shops and services, this neighbourhood is safe and has plenty to offer.

With many popular restaurants just right next door (Ichizen Japanese, Mythos Greek, Molino Italian, Le Cedre Lebanese, St. Jakob Bakery & Café etc.) and a mini supermarket just one minute walk away, you are well served in the area.

For those who like to keep active, NON STOP GYM is right across the road and Hallenbad City Indoor Swimming Pool is within five minutes of the apartment, while nearby Kasernenareal Park is perfect for a lunchtime stroll.

And if you’re keen to soak up some culture, the Kantonspolizei Zürich Kriminalmuseum and Haus Konstruktiv modern art museum are all a short walk away.
host_about:
Hello! My name is Cher.
 
 I enjoy traveling around the world, exploring new destinations, staying at luxury properties and  learning about other cultures. 

My philosophy is "Be a traveler, not a tourist!"
 
You are most welcome to come and stay in my unique apartments in Zurich, which have been prepared with you, the traveller in mind! The apartment will be your home away from home. 
 
 I consider each one of you as my guests and not customers. I will be very happy to give you recommendations during your stay, and I have prepared a bespoke Manual which upon check-in will give you useful information about the location, public transport and recommendations to restaurants and cafes in the neighbourhood, with clear directions how to get there from the apartment.

description:

The flat has 3 bedrooms with double beds and sofa bed in living room, 2 bathrooms with shower and bath tub an amazing and well furnished kitchen.

neighborhood_overview:
The tram station Feldeggstrasse is just around the corner.

From the airport: take the direct S-Bahn to Bahnhof Stadelhofen (18 min) then walk (10 min) or take the tram number 4 from Bellevue to Feldeggstrasse (2 min).

From the main station: take the tram number 4 from Bahnhofquai to Feldeggstrasse.

The apartment doesn't have a designed parking space, but there are a few options to park your car, the price is 35-45 CHF/day.
1. Covered car park : Parkhaus Utoquai: Färberstrasse 6, 8008 Zürich
2. Covered car park: Parkhaus Feldegg, Riesbachstrasse 7, 8008 Zürich
3. Covered car park: Parkhaus Zürichhorn, Dufourstrasse 142, Zürich
4. You also can park your car on a white zone with parking meter (5 CHF/2 hours)
5. I can also arrange a parking space for you, feel free to ask me, the price is 20 CHF/day

host_about:
Hey wir sind Pirmin und Patrick und haben im Jahr 2023 STAYY Living Like Home gegründet. Uns ist es wichtig, euch stets und konstant eine tolle Unterkunft zur Verfügung zu stellen. Wir legen viel Wert auf die Einrichtung, möglichst nachhaltig zu agieren und unsere Gäste wie Freunde zu behandeln.
Wir freuen uns jedenfalls, wenn wir dir als Gast in unseren Unterkünften ein tolles Erlebnis und schöne Erinnerungen bieten dürfen.

neighborhood_overview:
The house is situated in the Oerlikon neighborhood, which offers a unique blend of residential charm and commercial vibrancy. The local culture and traditions reflect the modern and cosmopolitan atmosphere of Zurich. The neighborhood is known for its diverse community and welcoming atmosphere.

In terms of stores, Oerlikon features a range of shops and boutiques catering to various interests and needs. From fashion boutiques and specialty stores to grocery markets and convenience stores, residents and visitors can find everything they require within a short distance.

When it comes to bars and restaurants, Oerlikon offers a wide selection of options. From cozy cafes serving Swiss delicacies to international cuisine restaurants, there is something to satisfy every palate. Whether you're craving traditional Swiss dishes or exploring global flavors, you'll find a diverse culinary scene to indulge in.

Outdoor activities are plentiful in the area. Oerlikon boa
host_about: Ich bin Start-Up Unternehmer mit Leidenschaft. Neue Idee, dynamische Teams und pragmatische Lösungen finde ich absolut spannend. Da das Leben aber nicht nur aus Arbeit besteht, liebe ich die Natur, Architektur und insbesondere Häuser mit Charakter. Häuser, wie sie heute nicht mehr gebaut werden, mit all ihren Ecken und Kanten. Einrichten ist ebenfalls eine grosse Leidenschaft.

name: Loft in the center of Zurich
description:
Spacious industrial loft in the middle of Zurich!
This unique accommodation in a former car garage is just a minute's walk from Lake Zurich. 2 lockable double rooms, 1 large lounge with a free-standing double bed, a large couch, a spacious kitchen, a bathroom.
host_about:
Unique location, directly on Limmatquai in the heart of Zurich's old town. Only 7 minutes by foot to the train station, a tram stop is just outside the building (»Rudolf-Brun-Brücke»). 
The rooms are newly renovated, they all have a sink in the room, toilets and showers are shared.
It's an almost 500-year-old building with a lot of charm. 
***
Einmalige Lage, direkt am Limmatquai im Herzen von Zürich. Nur 7 Gehminuten vom Hauptbahnhof entfernt, Tramhaltestelle »Rudolf-Brun-Brücke» direkt vor dem Haus.
Frisch renovierte und neu eingerichtete Zimmer, alle mit Lavabo im Zimmer, Duschen/Toiletten auf dem Gang. 
Schöner Aufenthaltsraum mit Blick auf die Limmat. Ein 500-jähriges Haus mit viel Charme!

I look forward to welcoming you in my home!

neighborhood_overview:
Enchanting Lakeside Neighborhood in Zurich
Welcome to our captivating neighborhood, beautifully nestled on the shores of Zurich Lake. Here, tranquility meets convenience, making it a perfect locale for both short and long-term stays.

- Tram stop in front of the house
- 6 min with direct tram to Paradeplatz
- 10 min with direct tram to Zurich Main Station

The neighborhood boasts a rich tapestry of charming houses and apartments, interspersed with vibrant foliage and mature trees. The serenity here is second to none, making it an ideal retreat from the city's hustle and bustle.

neighborhood_overview:
The 4th of Zurich is a dynamic and vibrant area, known for its cultural diversity and artistic atmosphere. It's a short distance from the city center, making it an attractive place for both residents and visitors.

This neighborhood is famous for its art and creative scene, with numerous art galleries, ateliers, and spaces for cultural events. The area is also an independent fashion hub, with a variety of unique designer shops and boutiques offering an alternative shopping experience.

The neighborhood is home to a vibrant culinary scene that reflects its cultural diversity. Here you can find restaurants and cafes that offer kitchens from all over the world, as well as traditional local options. There are also several specialty grocery markets and shops selling fresh and artisanal produce.

neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to the lively Oerlikon district, where local culture and modern living harmonize in delightful unity. Here's the scoop on this vibrant neighborhood:

Local Culture and Traditions: Oerlikon thrives on its colorful mix of local and international residents, resulting in a uniquely Swiss yet cosmopolitan atmosphere. It's where Swiss precision meets 21st-century urban flair.

Stores: Whether you're after everyday essentials or hunting for Swiss gems, Oerlikon's got you covered with its array of stores, from supermarkets to charming boutiques.

Bars and Restaurants: Get ready for a culinary journey in Oerlikon, where dining options range from Swiss classics like fondue and raclette to worldly delights that'll tickle your taste buds.

Outdoor Activities: While primarily residential and commercial, Oerlikon offers green gems. Gustav-Ammann-Park beckons with serene picnic spots, and MFO-Park showcases modern architecture amidst lush greenery.

name: Blueground | Wipkingen, garden, near supermarket
description: Discover the best of Zurich, with this three bedroom apartment in District 10, Wipkingen. with balcony views over the city. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this contemporary Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, charming living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #ZRH132)
neighborhood_overview: Serene Wipkingen is one of the quarters of Zürich's tenth district. Set along the Limmat River, this dynamic area is ideal for new arrivals to the city. There are a variety of cafes, bars and restaurants near the riverbank, including everything from regional French cuisine to pizza to Indian barbecue. There is also a supermarket in Wipkingen for anyone who prefers to self cater. Several museums, including the National Finance Museum, and a cinema are a short walk from Wipkingen. The neighborhood is served by several tram and bus lines as well as local and regional rail from Zürich Wipkingen train station.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood surrounding the apartment is called Oerlikon, a bustling district situated in the northern part of Zurich. With its excellent public transportation network—including trams, buses, and trains—Oerlikon is well-connected to Zurich and beyond. Overall, Oerlikon is a vibrant and dynamic neighborhood, offering both residents and visitors a plethora of amenities and activities to enjoy.

host_about: Willkommen bei UP & GREAT, Ihrem Experten für Immobilien und Innenarchitektur. Zurich's Oerlikon neighborhood is a vibrant and diverse area offering a mix of residential, commercial, and cultural amenities. Here's a brief description of the neighborhood:

Oerlikon is known for its modern and dynamic atmosphere. It's a bustling district with a rich history and a promising future. Here, you'll find a blend of old and new, as traditional Swiss elements mix with contemporary urban living.

Key highlights of Oerlikon include:

Excellent Connectivity: Oerlikon is a transportation hub with its own train station, making it easy to access other parts of Zurich and Switzerland. You're well-connected to both the city center and Zurich Airport.

name: Luxe Zurich home with Lake Views
description:
Enjoy time with the whole family in my stylish home that overlooks Lake Zurich and the historical and affluent Zurichberg neighbourhood.

Feel pampered with designer furniture, luxurious marble fittings and a spacious light & art filled home that has been lovingly curated.

Well connected by bus, Dolderbahn and Trams to central Zurich attractions.

Walking distance to cafes, bakeries, supermarket, nature walks, university district, Kinderspital and the Dolder pool and golf driving range.
neighborhood_overview: Zürichberg is one of the most highly desired parts of the City. On the one hand, its owes its appeal to its central location – the university and ETH, the University Medical Center, Kunsthaus, cinemas, museums, galleries and even the Lake can be reached within minutes, either on foot or by tram depending on your location. At the same time, those who live here get to bask in glorious sunlight all day long, enjoying tranquil vistas within truly friendly neighborhoods. Exquisitely beautiful and elegant historic structures beside art nouveau buildings line Scheuchzerstrasse, perhaps the most beautiful street in all of Kreis 7.
host_about:
Intrepid experience-seeking expat with stints in Sydney, Hong Kong, London and Zurich as home bases. 

Aussie at core, which means I am friendly, resourceful and respectful of your space. I don't smoke, drink only on occasion and like to explore new places as a local would. Always open to local food recommendations : )

neighborhood_overview:
Situated in the heart of Zurich's vibrant Seefeld district, our apartment places you at the center of a dynamic and fashionable environment. Seefeld is celebrated for its lively cafes, tempting restaurants, and buzzing bars, making it a favorite destination for both locals and visitors. This district embodies a multicultural essence, enriched by a diverse community of expats and international students, giving it a unique cosmopolitan flair and allowing you to experience a blend of local and global cultures.

Step outside, and you’ll find yourself surrounded by a diverse selection of shops and boutiques. From luxurious designer outlets to quaint artisanal stores, Seefeld offers an inviting and varied shopping experience. For those who love the outdoors, the district is ideally located near picturesque parks and the beautiful Lake Zurich, perfect for enjoying refreshing nature walks or engaging in exciting water activities.

name: Blueground | Wiedikon, balcony & w/d, nr market
description: Discover the best of Zurich, with this three bedroom apartment in District 3, Wiedikon. . It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this elegantly Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, beautiful living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #ZRH164)
neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon is Zurich's third district, and has a residential character. This quiet neighborhood is set on the lower slopes of Uetliberg, which makes for some incredible views. There are also hiking trails nearby, including the Planet Trail, an easy two hour hike from Uetliberg to Felsenegg. Wiedikon is home to a variety of restaurants, encompassing everything from fast casual dining to traditional Swiss fare. The Sihlcity shopping mall is the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy, and the surrounding area is home to cocktail lounges and pubs, as well as several notable international restaurants. There are train stations and tram stops throughout Wiedikon, making it easy to get into the heart of the city quickly.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Blueground | Wipkingen, storage & shared garden
description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this lovely District 10, Wipkingen furnished three bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and exquisite living room with great balcony views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Zurich has to offer! (ID #ZRH134)
neighborhood_overview: Serene Wipkingen is one of the quarters of Zürich's tenth district. Set along the Limmat River, this dynamic area is ideal for new arrivals to the city. There are a variety of cafes, bars and restaurants near the riverbank, including everything from regional French cuisine to pizza to Indian barbecue. There is also a supermarket in Wipkingen for anyone who prefers to self cater. Several museums, including the National Finance Museum, and a cinema are a short walk from Wipkingen. The neighborhood is served by several tram and bus lines as well as local and regional rail from Zürich Wipkingen train station.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

description: Show up and start living from day one in Zurich with this bright three bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped District 2, Enge home . (ID #ZRH160)
neighborhood_overview: Enge is nestled between the Limmat River and Lake Zürich, and the neighborhood is part of Zürich's 2nd district. This tiny area packs in a lot to see and do. Enge is home to the FIFA World Football Museum and the Museum Rietberg, a 19th century villa that now displays non-European artworks. There are also several parks to enjoy: heavily landscaped Reiter Park recalls the glamorous of a bygone age while lakeside Belvoirpark is perfect for a picnic or morning jog. You can find everything from fast food to traditional Swiss cuisine to sushi in Enge. The neighborhood is served by several bus and tram lines as well as Zürich's S-Bahn trains.

name: Cozy Zurich Apartment with Easy Access
description: Welcome to our cozy apartment, just 21 minutes from Zurich city center. This well-appointed space features two bedrooms with double beds, a full bathroom with a bathtub and shower, and a spacious living room with a sofa bed and dining area. Perfect for families, couples, or small groups, the apartment blends comfort and convenience. With excellent public transport nearby, you can easily explore Zurich's attractions while enjoying a quiet neighborhood setting.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in Zurich's Oerlikon district, a neighborhood seamlessly blending local culture, modern convenience, and a vibrant atmosphere. Here's a snapshot of what the area has to offer:

Diverse Cultural Fusion: Oerlikon's community is a melting pot of local and international residents, creating a vibrant cultural blend. While lacking the historical charm of Zurich's Old Town, Oerlikon delivers a contemporary Swiss urban experience, combining Swiss efficiency with cosmopolitan living.

Shopping Variety: The neighborhood features a diverse range of shops, from supermarkets to boutiques and specialty stores, catering to everyday needs and offering unique Swiss products.

Dining Delights: Oerlikon boasts an array of bars and restaurants serving Swiss and international cuisine, along with trendy dining options. Whether you crave Swiss classics like fondue or want to embark on a global culinary journey, Oerlikon has something for every palate.
host_about:
We turn temporarily vacant properties into contemporary furnished short-term rental apartments. 

Our apartments shall be functional and clean at a fair rate and our team can be reached 24/7 in order to assist you with anything you might need. 

Stay in our apartments without being guilty of contributing to gentrification. Our apartments are not being rented from the regular market to be let as furnished apartments. name: Basic 2-Bed Flat with Sofa Bed in Zurich
description: Welcome to our cozy 2-bedroom apartment in Zurich, just 25 minutes from the city center. Ideal for a practical stay, the apartment offers easy access to public transport, making it easy to explore Zurich's attractions. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, a relaxing living room with a convertible sofa, and a bathroom with a bathtub and shower. This apartment provides all the essentials for a comfortable and convenient stay.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a residential area known for its green spaces and friendly, community-focused atmosphere. This part of Zurich is perfect for guests who want to experience the calm side of city living while still being well-connected to the hustle and bustle of the city center.

The neighborhood offers a peaceful, suburban feel with tree-lined streets, parks, and a close-knit community vibe. It's a great place for those who enjoy leisurely walks, jogging, or simply relaxing in the local parks. Schwamendingen is also known for its safety and family-friendly environment, making it ideal for all types of travelers.

The apartment is only a 25-minute tram ride from the city center, where you can explore Zurich’s Old Town, the famous Bahnhofstrasse shopping street, and a plethora of museums, galleries, and cultural sites.

Within walking distance, you'll find several grocery stores, bakeries, cafes, and local restaurants offering a variety of Swiss a
